name: Unity Music Tiles
description:
This is a music game made with Unity3D.

With this music game, you can play many classical music sheets by many famous musicians such as Beethoven, Chopin, Bach and so on.

*HOW TO PLAY*
1. Tap the short black tile or white tile
2. Tap and hold the long black tile or white tile
3. Tap quickly on the big tile
4. Tap and swerve on the twisted long tile

Music Tiles is a registered trademark and this app has obtained the permission of the trademark owner to use it.
